EndpointConfiguration.description: The configuration for a given endpoint

EndpointId.description: Id of the endpoint. For Network/Application Load Balancer this value is the ARN.  For EIP, this value is the allocation ID.  For EC2 instances, this is the EC2 instance ID

ClientIPPreservationEnabled.description: true if client ip should be preserved

ListenerArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the listener
ListenerArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the listener

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

EndpointGroupRegion.description: The name of the AWS Region where the endpoint group is located
